- the Versatile Commodore Emulator

Download VICE for Solaris / SunOS systems

We are no more providing binaries for Solaris. Please get in touch with us if you want to help improving the Solaris ports and/or want to provide binaries. Occasionally we might upload unofficial test builds here.

Old (VICE 3.0) binary distributions

  • Binary for M68K SunOS systems: SDLVICE-3.0-m68k-sunos.tar.gz. Unpack in /usr/local
  • Binary for Sparc SunOS systems: SDLVICE-3.0-sparc-sunos.tar.bz2. Unpack in /usr/local
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 2.4 systems: vice-sdl-3.0-sol24-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 2.5 systems: vice-sdl-3.0-sol25-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 2.6 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol26-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 7 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol7-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 8 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol8-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 9 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol9-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 10 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol10-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris Express/OpenSolaris systems: vice-xaw-3.0-osol-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 11 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol11-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 11.1 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol11.1-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 11.2 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol11.2-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Intel Solaris 11.3 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol11.3-x86-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 2.3 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol23-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 2.4 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol24-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 2.5 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol25-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 2.6 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol26-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 7 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol7-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 8 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol8-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 9 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol9-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.
  • Binary for Sparc Solaris 10 systems: vice-xaw-3.0-sol10-sparc-local.pkg.tgz. To be installed with the Solaris installer.

Older binary distributions

Binaries of even older releases can be found on http://www.zimmers.net/anonftp/pub/cbm/crossplatform/emulators/VICE.

For more information visit the main page.
